english: Good day! Nice to meet you.
I have a cat and a dog.

polish: Mam dwa oczy i dwa uszy.
english: I have two eyes and two ears.
The computer is on the table.
The bed is in the room.
I am going to the bank.
The cinema is in the center.
The cafe is on the corner.
The police officer works at night.
The salesperson is in the shop.
The student is at the university.
The lawyer works in an office.
The actor acts in a film.
The secretary works in an office.
The meat is on the table.
I drink coffee in the morning.
I eat breakfast in the morning.
I get up at six in the morning.
I work from Monday to Friday.
Sometimes I go to the cinema in the evening.
I sleep eight hours a day.

polish: W tym miesiącu mam dużo pracy.
english: I have a lot of work this month.

polish: Mój dzień zaczyna się o szóstej rano.
english: My day starts at six in the morning.

polish: Po pracy zawsze idę do domu.
english: After work I always go home.
On Monday I have many meetings.

polish: Śpię około siedmiu godzin każdej nocy.
english: I sleep about seven hours every night.
When will you get up in the morning?
I work eight hours a day.

polish: Przerwę na kawę jem o dziesiątej.
english: I have a coffee break at ten.

polish: Czasami nie mam czasu na obiad.
english: Sometimes I don't have time for lunch.

polish: Uczę się polskiego trzy razy w tygodniu.
english: I study Polish three times a week.
Yesterday I couldn't get up early.
I will work the whole week.
I never drink coffee in the evening.

polish: W tym roku chcę nauczyć się więcej.
english: This year I want to learn more.
I get up earlier on working days.
I have to work on Saturday.
I work from eight to four.

polish: W przyszłym miesiącu będę miał urlop.
english: Next month I will have vacation.
A minute's break does me good.

polish: Pracuję siedem dni w tygodniu teraz.
english: I'm working seven days a week now.

polish: Nigdy nie jem po dwudziestej drugiej.
english: I never eat after ten at night.
I always prepare myself in the evening.

polish: W tej chwili mam dużo pracy.
english: At the moment I have a lot of work.
I go to work by bus.
I arrive at the bus stop at eight.

polish: Jaki jest najlepszy sposób na dojazd?
english: What is the best way to get there?
How do I get to the train station?
The train leaves in ten minutes.
I want to buy a ticket to Warsaw.
Where is the number 5 bus stop?
The car is parked on the street.
The taxi is waiting in front of the hotel.

polish: Bilet w jedną stronę kosztuje osiem złotych.
english: A one-way ticket costs eight zlotys.
Which bus goes to the city center?

polish: Droga do szkoły zajmuje piętnaście minut.
english: The route to school takes fifteen minutes.

polish: Mapa miasta jest w informacji turystycznej.
english: The city map is at the tourist information.

polish: Musisz przesiaść się na dworcu głównym.
english: You need to change trains at the main station.
The bus arrives every twenty minutes.
Where can I get a taxi?
The new car is very expensive.
The last train leaves at eleven.

polish: Jedziesz do domu samochodem czy pociągiem?
english: Are you going home by car or by train?

polish: Bilet powrotny jest tańszy niż dwa bilety w jedną stronę.
english: A return ticket is cheaper than two one-way tickets.
I live near the bus stop.
The driver is driving too fast.

polish: Ta droga jest zamknięta z powodu remontu.
english: This road is closed due to repairs.

polish: Ile czasu trwa jazda pociągiem do Gdańska?
english: How long does the train journey to Gdańsk take?
The bus is full of passengers.
The conductor is checking the passengers' tickets.
I would like to reserve a seat on the train.

polish: Która linia autobusu idzie na stadion?
english: Which bus line goes to the stadium?
How much does this sweater cost?

polish: To jest za drogie dla mnie.
english: This is too expensive for me.
I would like to buy milk and bread.
I'll take a Medium size, please.
I am looking for new pants.
Did you have this item yesterday?
I would like to pay by card.
I recommend this shop to friends.

polish: Czy jest rabat na ten towar?
english: Is there a discount on this item?
I need a very small size.

polish: To jest za duże dla mnie.
english: This is too big for me.
Do you have something of better quality?
I would like two kilograms of meat.
I would like to meet you.
What is new in your family?
Are you going to the party tomorrow?
I invite you to my birthday.
My friend works as a teacher.
My friend likes to read books.

polish: Spotykamy się z rodziną każdy weekend.
english: We meet with family every weekend.
I met an old friend in the city.

polish: Chciałbym się spotkać z Tobą jutro.
english: I would like to meet you tomorrow.

polish: Rozmawiamy o naszych planach na wakacje.
english: We are talking about our vacation plans.

polish: Rozmawiałem z moją mamą przez telefon.
english: I talked with my mom on the phone.
What do you say about this movie?
He told me he would be late.

polish: Mówię o tym zawsze z moim tatą.
english: I always talk about this with my dad.
Listen to me! This is important.
I listened to my friend's advice.

polish: Dostałem zaproszenie na wesele mojego kuzyna.
english: I received an invitation to my cousin's wedding.

polish: Czy przyslesz zaproszenie na moją imprezę?
english: Will you send an invitation to my party?

polish: Zapraszam Cię na moje urodziny w piątek.
english: I invite you to my birthday on Friday.

polish: Na imprezie będzie dużo muzyki i tańca.
english: At the party there will be lots of music and dancing.

polish: Poszliśmy na imprezę u mojego przyjaciela.
english: We went to a party at my friend's place.

polish: Wesele będzie w czerwcu w kościele.
english: The wedding will be in June at the church.

polish: Ile osób będzie na Twoim weselu?
english: How many people will be at your wedding?
I celebrated my birthday with my family.
We will celebrate the new year together.

polish: Jak świętują urodziny w Twojej rodzinie?
english: How do you celebrate birthdays in your family?
My friend invited me to dinner.

polish: Moja rodzina mieszka daleko od miasta.
english: My family lives far from the city.

polish: Rozmawiałem z przyjacielem o jego nowej pracy.
english: I talked with my friend about his new job.

polish: Spotkamy się przed kinem o szóstej.
english: We'll meet in front of the cinema at six.
I like to listen to my grandfather's stories.

polish: Powinna posłuchać tego, co mówią ci ludzie.
english: You should listen to what those people are saying.
I would like to order soup.
Can I have the bill, please?
I like to cook Polish dishes.
Waiter, we have been waiting for twenty minutes.

polish: Ta porcja jest zbyt duża dla mnie.
english: This portion is too big for me.

polish: Czy mogę prosić o mały rachunek?
english: Can I have a small bill, please?
I like to cook on weekends.
I need a recipe for gingerbread.

polish: W Polsce używamy dużo czarnego pieprzu.
english: In Poland, we use a lot of black pepper.

polish: Ta restauracja jest bardzo dobra i tania.
english: This restaurant is very good and cheap.
I am waiting for my order.

polish: Chciałbym mały obiad, nie wielką porcję.
english: I would like a light lunch, not a big portion.

polish: Czy mogę prosić o wodę bez gazu?
english: Can I have still water, please?

polish: Zamawiamy dwie zupy i jeden piernik.
english: We order two soups and one gingerbread.
Is the bill together or separate?
I recommended this restaurant to my friends.

polish: Smaczne przepisy są w tej książce.
english: Tasty recipes are in this book.

polish: Jedzenie w tej restauracji jest bardzo smaczne.
english: The food in this restaurant is very tasty.

polish: Wolę gotować w domu niż jeść na mieście.
english: I prefer to cook at home than to eat out.
How much is the lunch menu?

polish: Mogę prosić o drugą porcję chleba?
english: Can I have a second serving of bread?
The food here is always fresh.
I need to go to the doctor.

polish: Weź to lekarstwo trzy razy dziennie.
english: Take this medicine three times a day.

polish: Nie mogę spać z powodu bólu.
english: I cannot sleep because of pain.
I need medicine for a cough.
The doctor says I am healthy.
I was sick for three days.
I sneezed a few times today.
I need to rest and be strong.

polish: Piję dużo wody, bo mam gorączkę.
english: I drink a lot of water because I have a fever.

polish: Jutro pójdę do doktora na wizytę.
english: Tomorrow I will go to the doctor for a visit.

polish: Lekarstwo pomaga mi czuć się lepiej.
english: The medicine helps me feel better.

polish: Mam grypę, więc zostanę w domu.
english: I have the flu, so I will stay home.
Take this medicine before a meal.

polish: Mój syn jest chory, musimy do doktora.
english: My son is sick, we need to go to the doctor.

polish: Czy to lekarstwo jest dla dorosłych?
Boli mnie głowa i mam ból gardła.
english: I have a headache and a sore throat.
I feel better after taking the medicine.

polish: Ta apteka jest blisko mojego domu.
english: This pharmacy is close to my home.
The doctor said I need to rest.

polish: Przygotowuję się do wizyty u doktora.
english: I am preparing for a doctor's visit.

polish: Gdy czuję się chory, rzadko pracuję.
english: When I feel sick, I rarely work.

polish: Pracuję w biurze od czterech lat.
english: I have been working in an office for four years.
I have a meeting at two o'clock.
I will have vacation in July.

polish: Muszę zrobić ten projekt do piątku.
english: I need to do this project by Friday.

polish: Pracownicy są mili w moim zespole.
english: The employees are nice in my team.
We are working on a new project.

polish: Mam pięć lat doświadczenia w IT.
english: I have five years of experience in IT.
After work, I go to the gym.

polish: Projekt musi być gotowy za dwa tygodnie.
english: The project must be ready in two weeks.
The boss wants to talk about salary.
The office is on the third floor.
I work five days a week.
When can we have a meeting?

polish: Wysyłam email do zespołu o projekcie.
english: I am sending an email to the team about the project.

polish: Mam dobrą pracę i wysoki urlop.
english: I have a good job and high vacation time.

polish: Urlop jest zaplanowany na sierpień i wrzesień.
english: Vacation is planned for August and September.

polish: Email zawiera ważne informacje o spotkaniu.
english: The email contains important information about the meeting.

polish: Mam dwa lata doświadczenia w tym zawodzie.
english: I have two years of experience in this profession.

polish: Zespół z biura pracuje dobrze razem.
english: The office team works well together.

polish: Gramy w piłkę nożną w sobotę.

english: I listen to music while driving.
I go to the cinema every month.

polish: Gram w piłkę nożną dwa razy w tygodniu.
english: I play football twice a week.

polish: Śpiewam w chórze raz w tygodniu.
english: I sing in a choir once a week.
I like to sing my favorite songs.

I would like to learn to paint.

polish: Grasz na gitarze czy na fortepianie?
english: Do you play guitar or piano?

polish: Gram na skrzypcach od pięciu lat.
english: I have been playing violin for five years.
I listen to podcasts while working out.

polish: Nowy film zaczyna się o ósmej.
english: The new film starts at eight.
We went to the cinema on Saturday.

polish: Telewizor w moim pokoju jest duży.
english: The television in my room is big.

polish: Pracuję nad swoją nowoczesną grą wideo.
english: I am working on my modern video game hobby.

polish: Jeździę na rowerze prawie każdy dzień.
english: I ride my bike almost every day.
I run every morning in the park.

polish: Czy chcesz zagrać w koszykówkę ze mną?
english: Do you want to play basketball with me?

polish: Spędzam weekendy na czytaniu i relaksie.
english: I spend weekends reading and relaxing.

polish: Moja babcia lubi robić na drutach.

polish: Musimy przygotować się do testu z języka.
english: We need to prepare for the language test.

polish: Moja ocena z egzaminu jest dobra.
english: My grade on the exam is good.

polish: Lekcja angielskiego zaczyna się o dziewiątej.
english: The English class starts at nine.

polish: Nauczyciel zadał nam dużo pracy domowej.
english: The teacher gave us a lot of homework.

polish: Uczę się polskiego od trzech lat.
english: I have been learning Polish for three years.
A student must read many books.

polish: Czy możemy poprosić nauczyciela o wyjaśnienie?
english: Can we ask the teacher for an explanation?

polish: W tym semestrze mam pięć przedmiotów.
english: I have five subjects this semester.
The art subject is very interesting.

polish: Przyjaciółka pomaga mi uczyć się do egzaminu.
english: My friend helps me study for the exam.
The university has a good library.

polish: Chcę dostać dobrą ocenę z fizyki.
english: I want to get a good grade in physics.

polish: Lekcje są od ósmej do czwartej.
english: Classes are from eight to four.
I don't understand this math problem.

polish: Będę uczyć się do późna wieczorem.
english: I will study late in the evening.

polish: Egzamin z historii będzie w piątek.
english: The history exam will be on Friday.
I am looking for new shoes.

polish: Ubieraj się ciepło, bo jest zimno.
english: Dress warmly, because it is cold.
What clothes do you like to wear?

polish: Ten wzór jest bardzo ładny i nowoczesny.
english: This pattern is very nice and modern.

polish: Potrzebuję kupić nową sukienkę na imprezę.
english: I need to buy a new dress for the party.

polish: Spodnie są za krótkie dla mnie.
english: The pants are too short for me.

polish: Kupuję ubrania zawsze w tym sklepie.
english: I always buy clothes in this shop.

polish: Czy ten płaszcz jest z naturalnego materiału?
english: Is this coat made from natural fabric?
The hat protects me from the sun.

polish: Mam czarne buty i brązowe buty.
english: I have black shoes and brown shoes.

polish: W zimie zawsze noszę szalik i rękawiczki.
english: In winter I always wear a scarf and gloves.

polish: Pasek do spodni jest czarny lub brązowy.
english: The belt for pants is black or brown.
Do you like soft or hard fabrics?

polish: Ta koszulka ma piękny niebieski wzór.
english: This shirt has a beautiful blue pattern.
We try on clothes in the dressing room.

polish: Sukienka jest za długa, muszę ją skrócić.
english: The dress is too long, I need to shorten it.

polish: Preferencje dotyczące ubrań są różne dla każdej osoby.
english: Preferences for clothes are different for each person.

polish: Gdzie mogę znaleźć dobrych spodni do pracy?
english: Where can I find good pants for work?

polish: Cena tego materiału jest bardzo wysoka.
english: The price of this fabric is very high.

polish: Noszę koszulkę pod płaszczem w chłodne dni.
english: I wear a shirt under the coat on cool days.

polish: Buty muszą być wygodne dla mojej pracy.
english: Shoes must be comfortable for my work.

polish: Jaki rozmiar ma ta koszulka - mały czy duży?
english: What size is this shirt - small or large?

polish: Szalik chroni szyję przed zimnem i wiatrem.
english: The scarf protects the neck from cold and wind.

polish: Rękawiczki są ważne w zimie dla każdego.
english: Gloves are important in winter for everyone.

polish: Ten materiał można prać w pralce automatycznej?
english: Can this fabric be washed in a washing machine?

polish: Wzory na ubraniach mogą być geometryczne lub artystyczne.
english: Patterns on clothes can be geometric or artistic.

polish: Czasami kupuję ubrania na wyprzedaży, bo są tańsze.
english: Sometimes I buy clothes on sale because they are cheaper.

polish: Moja najlepsza sukienka jest z jedwabnego materiału.
english: My best dress is made of silk fabric.

polish: Buty sportowe są wygodniejsze niż buty wizytowe.
english: Sports shoes are more comfortable than formal shoes.
